item.title: Media Sterilisation Software
item.description: Methodology for testing Write several files to a drive Run the tool once, user zeroing option (overwrite all with zeros) Use HxD for Windows to calculate the Checksum64 for the full physical drive (should be all zeroes) Use HxD or Active@ DistEditor to see if there is some garbage left Active@ KillDisk Last Tool check: üìÜ 17/07/2022:
